lead_paragraph: Jack Swarbrick, a lawyer who helped draw numerous sporting events to Indianapolis, including the 2012 Super Bowl, was named the athletic director at Notre Dame. He succeeds Kevin White, who left the university May 31 to become the athletic director at Duke. Swarbrick is a 1976 graduate of Notre Dame.
